knownIssues.summary:
If you have a lookup to a standard object and make a change to that field you can't pull the field update.
Lookup fields referencing custom objects work just fine.
knownIssues.title: sfdx force:source:pull': Lookup fields (where the lookup targets a standard object) are not handled correctly

knownIssues.summary: When we Delete a custom field / object from Scratch org that is not removing its references from other components like Profiles , Permission sets , Layouts etc..
knownIssues.title: Deleting a custom field/object should remove references with force:source:pull
